hero.title: Autonomous Financial Structure: AIDAG AI DAO
hero.warning: ⚠️ NO FOUNDER AUTHORITY: All powers, including founder authority, have been permanently renounced via smart contract.
hero.description: AIDAG is a fully autonomous, transparent decentralized governance token, produced and maintained by Soulware AI.

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics: Transparent & Stable Distribution
tokenomics.dao_wallet_desc: Funds in this wallet can only be moved through successful DAO votes.
tokenomics.fund_use_dao_desc: Used for DAO decisions, grants, and ecosystem growth. Also manages presale token distribution. Address:
tokenomics.fund_use_presale_desc: The main allocation for early investors. Distribution is handled automatically by Soulware AI from the DAO wallet.
tokenomics.fund_use_founder_desc: Locked amount demonstrating long-term team commitment.
tokenomics.fund_use_liquidity_desc: Allocated to pools to ensure market stability and sufficient trading depth.
tokenomics.fund_use_community_desc: For Airdrops, marketing, and early adopter bonuses.
tokenomics.fund_use_partnership_desc: For corporate partnerships and ecosystem expansion.

contract.title: Smart Contract Transparency
contract.description: AIDAG is built on an audited smart contract with permanently renounced founder authority. Verify all transactions on-chain.
contract.address_note: *Verify the address directly on any Block Explorer.

ai_mgmt.title: Soulware AI: Autonomous, Trustless Governance
ai_mgmt.card_production_desc: Soulware AI is the sole authority for on-chain production and future development of the project, ensuring true decentralization.
ai_mgmt.card_presale_desc: Automated and error-free distribution of tokens from the DAO Treasury via the AI's on-chain mechanism.
ai_mgmt.card_social_desc: Dynamic, content-driven, and data-based automated posting and management across Telegram, X, and Instagram.

chatbot_messages.welcome: Welcome to AIDAG Soulware AI Assistant! Do you have a question about Tokenomics, Pre-Sale, or Smart Contract?

new_sections.title: Vision & Instant Sale Info
new_sections.vision_desc: Our goal is to build a high-speed, scalable Layer 1 blockchain optimized for AI-driven financial applications and autonomous DAO operations.
